txt.en: As you look down, you find a remnant of a fallen branch. The bark appears to be ashen-coloured and smells of decay, though something still speaks of an ancient beauty it may once have possessed.\n\nPerhaps you should bring this to Himeinior at Barad Angol to see if he can tell you anything about the branch.

'Thank you kindly for gathering such an exquisite specimen, [placeholder]. I have gathered several such branches myself, and this is the best of them thus far. \n\n'Sadly, it appears as if this poor branch has been blighted by some form of foul sorcery. It seems as if this sorcery has consumed its life and has left it naught but a husk, bereft of its former glory.'
You discovered a blighted branch in the Ashenslades, corrupted by an unknown disease.
Bring the blighted branch to Himeinior

Himeinior is at Barad Angol, a small camp at a tower overlooking Sâd Doldúr.\n\nYou should seek out Himeinior and give him the branch you found. Perhaps he can discern more about what is happening to the trees in the Ashenslades.
